Text:
The Guru is a 2002 British-French-American romantic comedy film written by Tracey Jackson and directed by Daisy von Scherler Mayer.

An ancient culture collides with modern life and one man brings the world to its feet 

The film stars Jimi Mistry as the eponymous character, Heather Graham as the actress he learns from, and Marisa Tomei, who helps him reach his guru status among her socialite New York City friends.

Enjoy this DVD quality print and Laugh till it hurts!
